meta.title: Vu Thanh Long - Full Stack Developer
meta.description: Vu Thanh Long - Full Stack Developer - About 6+ years of experience in software development with in-depth knowledge of modern front-end web framework. Skilled in React Js and Typescript, Web3, Ether.js, Next Js, NodeJs, CSS/SCSS including Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Ant Design, Material UI. Experience with ASP.NET, C#, MVC, SharePoint, SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB.
meta.ogDescription: Full Stack Developer with 6+ years of experience in modern web development
meta.keywords: Full Stack Developer, React, TypeScript, Next.js, Web3, Node.js, ASP.NET, C#, MVC, SharePoint, SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB

hero.name: Vu Thanh Long.
hero.title: I'm a full-stack developer!
hero.description: About 6+ years of experience in software development with in-depth knowledge of modern front-end web framework. Skilled in React Js and Typescript, Web3, Ether.js, Next Js, NodeJs, CSS/SCSS including Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Ant Design, Material UI. Experience with responsive layouts, cross-browser compatibility, and design layout using Figma. Also experienced with ASP.NET, C#, MVC, SharePoint, SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB. Familiar with GIT, Bitbucket, JIRA. Using English and Chinese like second language.
hero.cta: Want to know more about me ?

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello there! My name is Vu Thanh Long and I enjoy build things and learn new stuffs. I studied in HEDSPI - Back Khoa University and hold a bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Murdic University. I am a fast learner, enthusiastic, creative, and a team player. Currently residing in Ha Noi, Vietnam.
about.paragraph2: Outside of my professional interests, I have a passion for e-sports, Chinese chess, reading books, and am a big fan of wuxia novels.
about.paragraph3: I believe that my versatile interests, combined with my academic background and personal attributes, allow me to approach challenges with a unique perspective and continually strive for excellence in everything I do.
about.technologiesTitle: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

responsibilities: Coordinating with other teams (BA, Devops, development team) to improve the quality of products.
Design new code base to reduce the cost and enhance the flexibility for adaptation based on express, nextjs, tailwind, graphql.
Coding, bug fixing and code reviewing...

jobs.position: Student Major In Computer Science - BIS
responsibilities: Bachelor in Business Information System (BIS) and Computer Science ( Academic certification )
Majoring in Information System - HEDSPI Program

projects.title: MangaM
projects.subtitle: Vinox Co.,Ltd - Full-stack Developer
descriptions: A web-based system that allows the artists can publish their arts quickly, easily and at no cost.
The aim of this project was created solely to make meaningful and entertaining manga available for everyone regardless of their situations and locations.

projects.title: Soup Finance
projects.subtitle: Vinox Co.,Ltd - FE Web3 Developer
descriptions: Soup Finance is a decentralised cross-chain money market for the metaverse economy. Supply crypto-assets to earn interest, and borrow assets for low interest subsidised loans with $SOUP rewards.

projects.title: NFT Market
projects.subtitle: Vinox Co.,Ltd - FE Web3 Developer
descriptions: A Nft market for trading items from MetaSea - The Amazing Adventure is a multiplayer building game where anyone can buy and own rare items, collect ancient sea monsters and meet new friends.

contact.title: What's Next
contact.description: I'm really appriciate your time to make it so far. Although I'm not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
contact.thankYou: Thank you, and I wish you a happy day.

footer.inspiration: Thank you Brittany Chiang for inspiration
